data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all trips for authenticated user

data.current_description: list stops for a trip identified by {trip_id}
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all stops for a specific trip
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all stops (Step objects) for a trip identified by the trip_id path parameter.
